markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Elemental Ammunition](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1897)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Splash" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=150" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 42 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
**Ammunition** any

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

When activated, the reservoir of alchemical reagents in elemental ammunition atomizes on impact, dealing [persistent acid, cold, electricity, fire, or poison damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) to the target and splash damage in addition to the damage the attack normally deals. Each damage type requires a different formula, and the ammunition gains a trait matching the damage type.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 1"
pfs="Standard"
>
Elemental Ammunition (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 42 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 3 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The ammunition deals 1 persistent damage and 1 splash damage.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 5"
pfs="Standard"
>
Elemental Ammunition (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 42 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 21 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The ammunition deals 2d4 persistent damage and 2 splash damage.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 11"
pfs="Standard"
>
Elemental Ammunition (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 42 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 210 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The ammunition deals 3d4 persistent damage and 3 splash damage.
name: Elemental Ammunition
